DocksRoad_Sailor_000.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Docks roadOne of dock delivery folk - NOTE Please rename to Kolobeg.

Bonecloak_Civ_003.synopsis: OnelinerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Bonecloak'sCitizen that is being questioned.Only present after foundry destroyed.

BasiliskGate_FF_000.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Basilisk GateOne of the Flaming Fists.Please rename to Fist Nateen.

Bonecloak_FF_001_0.speaker: Fist Aggralix
Bonecloak_FF_001_0.text: She's really going for them, isn't she? Quite impressive, really.
Bonecloak_FF_001_0.context: NodeContext: Grudgingly impressed by their colleague's interrogation of two nearby civilians

Bonecloak_FF_001_1.speaker: Fist Aggralix
Bonecloak_FF_001_1.text: Wouldn't want her to catch me stumbling home from the tavern on a dark night.
Bonecloak_FF_001_1.context: NodeContext: Amused at their fellow Flaming Fist's ferocity in the pursuit of justice

Patrols_OnWall_FF_001_0.speaker: Fist Hagedorrn
Patrols_OnWall_FF_001_0.text: I was just thinking of someone I miss terribly who looks a lot like you. But you're not them, so move along.

Bonecloak_Civ_001_1.speaker: Drongo Bixworth
Bonecloak_Civ_001_1.text: Look, we weren't doing nothing, all right?

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_1.speaker: Kolobeg
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_1.text: We can't deliver our goods to the docks? Why?

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_4.speaker: Fist Pantella
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_4.text: New rule - it's a restricted area, top security.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_6.speaker: Felgi Diggums
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_6.text: But I can see people down there on the docks going about their business!

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_0.speaker: Fist Gneiss
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_0.text: Oh, we'll get to them soon enough.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_7.speaker: Kolobeg
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_7.text: We've got a job to do. These goods need to get delivered.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_9.speaker: Fist Pantella
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_9.text: And I have a duty to the city and to Lord Gortash. So halt right there.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_2.speaker: Felgi Diggums
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_2.text: Why this sudden restriction on visiting the docks, though?

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_5.speaker: Fist Gneiss
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_5.text: Somehow, citizen, Lord Gortash forgot to tell me. Isn't that strange?

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_10.speaker: Kolobeg
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_10.text: But I made a delivery to the docks just yesterday!

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_3.speaker: Fist Pantella
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_3.text: Sorry, citizen, the docks are now a restricted area.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_8.speaker: Felgi Diggums
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_8.text: Talk straight. Are you really just looking for a bribe?

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_11.speaker: Fist Gneiss
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsAgitated_11.text: Are you looking to get stomped flat by a Steel Watcher?

BasiliskGate_AD_FF_002_0.speaker: Fist Gummidge
BasiliskGate_AD_FF_002_0.text: Don't push us. This Watcher has a short temper.

BasiliskGate_AD_FF_002_1.speaker: Fist Gummidge
BasiliskGate_AD_FF_002_1.text: See this? This is what happens to troublemakers.

BasiliskGate_AD_FF_002_2.speaker: Fist Gummidge
BasiliskGate_AD_FF_002_2.text: Listen up! In Baldur's Gate, you do not mouth off to the Flaming Fist!

NearMermaid_Civilian_000_0.speaker: Yeller Dawg
NearMermaid_Civilian_000_0.text: Steel Watchers, dead and gone? I'll drink to that!

NearMermaid_Civilian_000_1.speaker: Yeller Dawg
NearMermaid_Civilian_000_1.text: Glad I came out of the Mermaid when I heard the fracas. I wouldn'a missed this for the world!

DocksRoad_Sailor_001_0.speaker: Felgi Diggums
DocksRoad_Sailor_001_0.text: Looks like the big metal bruiser has gone on permanent break. Maybe the Fists are next.

DocksRoad_Sailor_001_1.speaker: Felgi Diggums
DocksRoad_Sailor_001_1.text: Even before they got those big metal bruisers, the Fists were obnoxious, but now...

DocksRoad_Sailor_002_0.speaker: Earno Diggums
DocksRoad_Sailor_002_0.text: Someone ought to give these angry Fists a kind word and a biscuit, but that isn't going to be me.

DocksRoad_Sailor_002_1.speaker: Earno Diggums
DocksRoad_Sailor_002_1.text: Think I'll just sit back and rest my weary limbs while these angry youngsters sort matters out.

NearMermaid_Civilian_001_0.speaker: Saer Deelia
NearMermaid_Civilian_001_0.text: That wrecked Steel Watcher - ugh! It smells like something died in it!

NearMermaid_Civilian_001_1.speaker: Saer Deelia
NearMermaid_Civilian_001_1.text: This used to be a good neighbourhood, without all this unseemly squabbling.

BasiliskGate_Civilian_001_0.speaker: Eefa Barlow
BasiliskGate_Civilian_001_0.text: I didn't like those metal contraptions, but I like it even less that they've all collapsed. Can't depend on anything or anyone these days.

BasiliskGate_Civilian_001_1.speaker: Eefa Barlow
BasiliskGate_Civilian_001_1.text: Used to think those things were going to make me feel safer. Not anymore.

BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_1.speaker: Baz Hopbank
BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_1.text: Whoa, that metal monster don't look so big now.

BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_0.speaker: Scribe Goosequill
BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_0.text: The Watchers are history! Think for yourself and show some mercy.

BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_9.speaker: Fist Gummidge
BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_9.text: I still have my duty. Now step back, I know how to use this bow.

BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_2.speaker: Baz Hopbank
BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_2.text: That thing damn near busted her skull! I didn't see her make no trouble.

BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_6.speaker: Scribe Goosequill
BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_6.text: I know her, that's Gulster, she's no thief!

BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_11.speaker: Fist Gummidge
BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_11.text: Stay back and stay calm, I'm warning you. She was on the list.

BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_3.speaker: Baz Hopbank
BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_3.text: Let her go! Lord Gortash is dead, you have no right to hold her now!

BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_7.speaker: Fist Gummidge
BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_7.text: How does the death of Gortash change anything? Duty is duty.

BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_5.speaker: Baz Hopbank
BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_5.text: Yeah, but orders are orders, and whoever is in charge now must have new orders for you. Right?

BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_10.speaker: Baz Hopbank
BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_10.text: Come on! At least let us take her to a doctor!

BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_4.speaker: Scribe Goosequill
BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_4.text: That's my friend's niece! Let her go!

BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_8.speaker: Fist Gummidge
BasiliskGate_AD_CiviliansVouch_8.text: Back off. She goes into the clink unless Lord Gortash tells us otherwise.

NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_1.speaker: Saer Deelia
NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_1.text: I think it's outrageous that Fists should harass people in a nice neighbourhood!

NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_5.speaker: Fist Virry
NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_5.text: Formerly nice neighbourhood. Now back off, honey.

NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_2.speaker: Flaerian
NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_2.text: Saer Fist, I think you should reconsider your tactics here. Please.

NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_6.speaker: Yeller Dawg
NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_6.text: Yeah, Saer Fist. Show him why you're called Flaming Fists! Hee hee!

NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_0.speaker: Fist Virry
NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_0.text: One more word, and you're both getting the end of my nightstick.

NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_4.speaker: Flaerian
NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_4.text: I think your methods are somewhat unorthodox, Saer Fist.

NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_3.speaker: Fist Virry
NearMermaid_AD_CiviliansQuestions_3.text: Hard times, citizen. Let's not let them get any harder, eh?

NearMermaid_Civilian_002_0.speaker: Flaerian
NearMermaid_Civilian_002_0.text: What I want to know is, who's going to clean up that pile of Watcher junk? Not me.

NearMermaid_Civilian_002_1.speaker: Flaerian
NearMermaid_Civilian_002_1.text: I mean no disrespect, but I really think these Flaming Fists are out of line.

NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_00_0.speaker: Rox Flunter
NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_00_0.text: You really want to confiscate my cargo of ice wine?

NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_00_5.speaker: Fist Virry
NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_00_5.text: You're a little slow, but you get the point eventually. Citizen.

NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_00_1.speaker: Rox Flunter
NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_00_1.text: If this was ruby tonic, I'd let you have it.

NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_00_4.speaker: Fist Virry
NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_00_4.text: If this was ruby tonic, you could keep it.

NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_00_3.speaker: Rox Flunter
NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_00_3.text: But this wine is already paid for, it's due at the Elfsong Tavern!

NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_00_2.speaker: Fist Virry
NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_00_2.text: If it's already paid for, you lose nothing by delivering it to me instead. Right, citizen?

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_3.speaker: Kolobeg
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_3.text: Come on, Saer Fist, let us past - these deliveries are urgent.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_6.speaker: Fist Pantella
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_6.text: More urgent than justice? More urgent than the rule of law?

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_2.speaker: Fist Gneiss
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_2.text: Heh. You've got brains, for a dwarf.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_9.speaker: Kolobeg
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_9.text: Look, we just need to go past the foundry along the docks.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_12.speaker: Fist Pantella
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_12.text: My orders don't admit of any exceptions.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_4.speaker: Felgi Diggums
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_4.text: You know, if you'd just look the other way for a minute...

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_7.speaker: Fist Gneiss
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_7.text: You trying to bribe me? If so, where's the bribe?

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_13.speaker: Fist Pantella
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_13.text: Security's tightened since Gortash's death. You stay in your designated district.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_1.speaker: Kolobeg
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_1.text: Aw, come on, Saer Fist, we got urgent deliveries to make.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_0.speaker: Fist Gneiss
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_0.text: Urgent, is it? Why, you could be trying to sneak Gortash's assassins out in your cargo. I'd better search your goods.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_11.speaker: Kolobeg
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_11.text: You're joking, right? You couldn't fit a kobold in our cargo!

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_14.speaker: Kolobeg
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_14.text: The foundry's a wreck! There's nothing left to guard! Can we deliver our goods to the docks now?

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_5.speaker: Fist Pantella
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_5.text: Not just yet, citizen. The whole place is a crime scene.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_10.speaker: Felgi Diggums
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_10.text: We just need to go past the foundry to make our delivery on the wharf.

DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_15.speaker: Fist Gneiss
DocksRoad_AD_SailorsQuestions_15.text: Don't split hairs with me. You go no farther.

AtWall_Civ_001_0.speaker: Burzenberg
AtWall_Civ_001_0.text: That walking teapot will never walk again, or my name isn't Burzenberg.

AtWall_Civ_001_1.speaker: Burzenberg
AtWall_Civ_001_1.text: I stole an apple once when I was nine, but that thing won't know about it. I hope.

NearMermaid_FF_01_0.speaker: Fist Rockbothem
NearMermaid_FF_01_0.text: With our Steel Watchers turned into piles of junk, you'd think these traders would be happy to offer us a drink in consolation. Tightwads.

NearMermaid_FF_01_1.speaker: Fist Rockbothem
NearMermaid_FF_01_1.text: I'm in the right here! Strong drink qualifies as contraband - even thin piddle like Baalor's Ale.

BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_1.speaker: Korrinna Koreena
BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_1.text: If you really wanted to keep us safe, you'd tell us what happened to the Watchers!

BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_0.speaker: Flo Hurlburl
BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_0.text: We deserve to know the truth!

BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_6.speaker: Fist Jerbold
BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_6.text: Your safety is of utmost importance to Lord Gortash. A full investigation is underway.

BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_4.speaker: Flo Hurlburl
BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_4.text: Aren't you supposed to be on our side?

BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_8.speaker: Fist Jerbold
BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_8.text: Rest assured, citizens, Lord Gortash has the city's best interests at heart.

BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_3.speaker: Flo Hurlburl
BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_3.text: You're just trying to placate us!

BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_5.speaker: Fist Jerbold
BaldursMouth_AD_CiviliansQuestions_5.text: You'll have all the answers you need once official investigations are concluded.

NearMermaid_Trader_000_0.speaker: Rox Flunter
NearMermaid_Trader_000_0.text: The Fists don't swagger so much without their steel muscle to back them up.

NearMermaid_Trader_000_1.speaker: Rox Flunter
NearMermaid_Trader_000_1.text: Helm's glory! The finest Marsember Ice Wine, and these Fists want to confiscate it? I doubt their palates would even appreciate it!

Bonecloak_Civ_002_0.speaker: Peetri Sname
Bonecloak_Civ_002_0.text: I've never seen a Steel Watcher this messed up - have you? Wonder what happened to it.

Bonecloak_Civ_002_1.speaker: Peetri Sname
Bonecloak_Civ_002_1.text: Gods, you can see right inside it...

Bonecloak_Civ_000_0.speaker: Florean Bixworth
Bonecloak_Civ_000_0.text: Didn't know standing in the street was a crime.

Bonecloak_Civ_000_1.speaker: Florean Bixworth
Bonecloak_Civ_000_1.text: I suppose you think we're working for the Absolute too?

NearMermaid_FF_00_0.speaker: Fist Virry
NearMermaid_FF_00_0.text: I'm going to miss our big metal buddy. Never had an easier time of shaking down the locals than when we had a Watcher at our back.

NearMermaid_FF_00_1.speaker: Fist Virry
NearMermaid_FF_00_1.text: These sad little citizens actually think we'll let them off the hook if they complain loudly enough. Ha! What dopes.

NearMermaid_FF_00_2.speaker: Fist Virry
NearMermaid_FF_00_2.text: These idiot townies just don't get it. When a leader like Gortash gets snuffed, you got to tighten down the screws. It's expected, like.

NearMermaid_Trader_001_0.speaker: Cinna Brewcellar
NearMermaid_Trader_001_0.text: Never liked those big Watchers, but with them gone, who's going to protect us traders from street thugs? The Fists? Fah!

NearMermaid_Trader_001_1.speaker: Cinna Brewcellar
NearMermaid_Trader_001_1.text: If we don't deliver this Baalor Ale to the Blushing Mermaid, the folk there are going to get ugly. Well, uglier.

Bonecloak_FF_000_0.speaker: Fist Elthira Gossen
Bonecloak_FF_000_0.text: Do you mind? I'm in the middle of an interrogation.

Bonecloak_FF_000_1.speaker: Fist Elthira Gossen
Bonecloak_FF_000_1.text: Those agents of the Absolute aren't gonna out themselves - now leave me to do my job, eh?

BasiliskGate_FF_001_0.speaker: Fist Olloa
BasiliskGate_FF_001_0.text: The day of the big tin toys is over. Back to keeping order the old-fashioned way, with a boot and a truncheon.

BasiliskGate_FF_001_1.speaker: Fist Olloa
BasiliskGate_FF_001_1.text: If all these folks can just keep their shit together, maybe nobody else will get hurt. Maybe.

BaldursMouth_Civilian_002_0.speaker: 'Gunny' Sacko
BaldursMouth_Civilian_002_0.text: I don't like this. If something's capable of destroying even a Steel Watcher, what hope do the Fists have of protecting us?

BaldursMouth_Civilian_002_2.speaker: 'Gunny' Sacko
BaldursMouth_Civilian_002_2.text: The Flaming Fist are playing it cool, but look at them - they're scared.

BaldursMouth_Civilian_002_3.speaker: 'Gunny' Sacko
BaldursMouth_Civilian_002_3.text: The way I see it, if you've got nothing to hide, you've got nothing to fear from being watched.

BaldursMouth_Civilian_002_1.speaker: 'Gunny' Sacko
BaldursMouth_Civilian_002_1.text: It's not like the Steel Watchers are even sentient. Far as I can tell, they're more loyal than some of the Fists.

BaldursMouth_Civilian_002_4.speaker: 'Gunny' Sacko
BaldursMouth_Civilian_002_4.text: The Watchers just want to keep us safe, why don't people get that?

AtWall_FF_001_0.speaker: Fist Larche
AtWall_FF_001_0.text: That Watcher is down, and I'd wager it isn't getting up again. I'd give up on it, if it was up to me.

AtWall_FF_001_1.speaker: Fist Larche
AtWall_FF_001_1.text: As you can see, there's no trouble here, right? And I'm sure you don't want to cause any.

BaldursMouth_AD_FFwithWorker_0.speaker: Fist Jerbold
BaldursMouth_AD_FFwithWorker_0.text: People don't always know their own minds. We've got to keep them safe, that's all.

BaldursMouth_AD_FFwithWorker_5.speaker: Trina
BaldursMouth_AD_FFwithWorker_5.text: You'll not find any fearmongering here. We're an honest publication.

BaldursMouth_AD_FFwithWorker_3.speaker: Fist Jerbold
BaldursMouth_AD_FFwithWorker_3.text: Standard procedure. Gortash just wants to make sure that there's no misinformation.

BaldursMouth_AD_FFwithWorker_1.speaker: Trina
BaldursMouth_AD_FFwithWorker_1.text: The truth is the truth - we trust our readers to make up their own minds.

BaldursMouth_AD_FFwithWorker_4.speaker: Fist Jerbold
BaldursMouth_AD_FFwithWorker_4.text: I've no qualms about the quality of the content - I've always enjoyed reading it, myself.

BaldursMouth_AD_FFwithWorker_2.speaker: Trina
BaldursMouth_AD_FFwithWorker_2.text: Don't tell our writers that. Their egos are big enough as it is.

BasiliskGate_FF_002_0.speaker: Fist Gummidge
BasiliskGate_FF_002_0.text: I wonder if that wreck has any loose arrows on it. Though they probably wouldn't fit my bow, come to think of it.

BasiliskGate_FF_002_1.speaker: Fist Gummidge
BasiliskGate_FF_002_1.text: I don't like this. I don't like the look in some of their eyes.

AtWall_Civ_000_0.speaker: Courier Hara
AtWall_Civ_000_0.text: Why are we standing here if that thing is broken? This is ridiculous.

AtWall_Civ_000_1.speaker: Courier Hara
AtWall_Civ_000_1.text: I wish we could get this over with. If I don't make my deliveries, I don't get paid.

AtWall_Kid_001_0.speaker: Doober
AtWall_Kid_001_0.text: I wouldn't touch that thing if you double-drow-dared me!

AtWall_Kid_001_1.speaker: Doober
AtWall_Kid_001_1.text: The Watcher is super scary but still kind of cool. I bet I couldn't even lift that big sword.

BaldursMouth_Civilian_001_0.speaker: Flo Hurlburl
BaldursMouth_Civilian_001_0.text: I'm going to keep an eye on this thing - just in case it decides to rise and shine.

BaldursMouth_Civilian_001_1.speaker: Flo Hurlburl
BaldursMouth_Civilian_001_1.text: I feel a lot safer now that I've seen that that thing can 'die' just like anything else.

BaldursMouth_Civilian_001_2.speaker: Flo Hurlburl
BaldursMouth_Civilian_001_2.text: Safety my arse. Look at them, they're killing machines. What if one of them malfunctions?

BaldursMouth_Civilian_001_3.speaker: Flo Hurlburl
BaldursMouth_Civilian_001_3.text: You know, I didn't walk around armed until these Watchers showed up. 'Protection' my eye.

DocksRoad_FF_01_0.speaker: Fist Gneiss
DocksRoad_FF_01_0.text: We should probably look into what happened to the foundry, but maybe we'll just wait until the flames die down.

DocksRoad_FF_01_1.speaker: Fist Gneiss
DocksRoad_FF_01_1.text: Pantella's in a mood. Don't get in that Fist's way when she's in a mood.

Patrols_FF_Generic_0.speaker: Narrator
Patrols_FF_Generic_0.text: *The guard is busy with their patrol and has no time for idle chatter.*

Patrols_FF_Generic_1.speaker: Narrator
Patrols_FF_Generic_1.text: *Since the death of Gortash, the Flaming Fists seem as tense as cocked crossbows. It wouldn't take much to set them off.*

Bonecloak_FF_002_1.speaker: Fist Karoline
Bonecloak_FF_002_1.text: Don't look down your nose - it's gotta be done. Followers of the Absolute are everywhere.

AtWall_Kid_000_0.speaker: Markiza
AtWall_Kid_000_0.text: Look at this thing, Doober! It's still kind of scary, only not really.

AtWall_Kid_000_1.speaker: Markiza
AtWall_Kid_000_1.text: I don't like it, Doober. It's too big, and too clanky, and it smells like rotten eggs.

BaldursMouth_FF_001_0.speaker: Fist Jerbold
BaldursMouth_FF_001_0.text: We'll keep the city safe - we always have. But it sure was easier with the Watchers to help.

BaldursMouth_FF_001_1.speaker: Fist Jerbold
BaldursMouth_FF_001_1.text: Don't trouble yourself about the Watchers, all right? We're investigating it as we speak.

BaldursMouth_FF_001_2.speaker: Fist Jerbold
BaldursMouth_FF_001_2.text: I am in the middle of official Fist business, so kindly step back. Thank you.

BaldursMouth_FF_001_3.speaker: Fist Jerbold
BaldursMouth_FF_001_3.text: No, we're not censoring the Mouth - we're simply doing a routine inspection. And no, I cannot sell you a copy.

BasiliskGate_Civilian_002_0.speaker: Scribe Goosequill
BasiliskGate_Civilian_002_0.text: Gods, another one in a crumpled heap! Who will protect us now?

BasiliskGate_Civilian_002_1.speaker: Scribe Goosequill
BasiliskGate_Civilian_002_1.text: What did she even do? I bet nobody knows. I didn't see her do anything wrong.

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_1.speaker: Florean Bixworth
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_1.text: Look, we've got nothing to do with the Absolute.

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_6.speaker: Fist Elthira Gossen
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_6.text: I wouldn't expect you to admit your nefarious allegiance. You lot are sworn to secrecy, aren't you?

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_4.speaker: Drongo Bixworth
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_4.text: Please, just let us go and we'll be out of your way.
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_4.context: NodeContext: Sounding a little upset at this point

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_0.speaker: Fist Elthira Gossen
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_0.text: You can go once we're done with you.

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_7.speaker: Fist Elthira Gossen
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_7.text: Loitering's what you were doing. Loitering with intent, I shouldn't wonder.

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_9.speaker: Florean Bixworth
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_9.text: Loitering? I've got a gammy leg - that's just how I look!

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_2.speaker: Drongo Bixworth
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_2.text: Yeah, we weren't doing anything - just waiting for a friend!

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_11.speaker: Fist Elthira Gossen
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_11.text: So were you doing nothing or were you waiting for a friend? Which is it?
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_11.context: NodeContext: Suspiciously; thinks they've caught them in a lie

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_12.speaker: Fist Elthira Gossen
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_12.text: And what do you know about the Absolute, eh?

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_5.speaker: Florean Bixworth
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_5.text: Army's marching on the city! What else is there to know?!
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_5.context: NodeContext: Incredulous and a little sarcastic (but still afraid of the Flaming Fist)

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_14.speaker: Drongo Bixworth
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_14.text: I don't know nothing! We were just standing here!

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_16.speaker: Fist Elthira Gossen
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_16.text: What, Lord Gortash is dead, and all you've got to do is stand around and stare? Looks suspicious, I think.

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_3.speaker: Florean Bixworth
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_3.text: Suspicious? What? How? I don't even know what that means.

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_10.speaker: Drongo Bixworth
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_10.text: Yeah, Florean's too dumb to do anything suspicious. He wouldn't know where to start.

Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_13.speaker: Fist Elthira Gossen
Bonecloak_AD_Questioning_13.text: So you're the smart one, then? Maybe it's you I should haul in to the station for questions.

AtWall_Civ_002_0.speaker: Moorino
AtWall_Civ_002_0.text: I don't have time for this. That pile of junk is done interrogating innocent citizens.

AtWall_Civ_002_1.speaker: Moorino
AtWall_Civ_002_1.text: Gods, this is totally obnoxious. But I guess I'd better just keep my lips sewn shut, eh?

AtWall_AD_FF_0.speaker: Fist Nephel
AtWall_AD_FF_0.text: Evaluation is harmless. Make no sudden moves and no one gets hurt.

AtWall_AD_FF_1.speaker: Fist Nephel
AtWall_AD_FF_1.text: Pay attention when spoken to. Lord Gortash's passing necessitates a tightening of city security. Follow orders and no one need get hurt.

AtWall_AD_FF_2.speaker: Fist Nephel
AtWall_AD_FF_2.text: Designated citizens will please stand still for evaluation.

AtWall_AD_FF_3.speaker: Fist Nephel
AtWall_AD_FF_3.text: No one has anything to fear if everyone just does what they're told.

DocksRoad_FF_00_0.speaker: Fist Pantella
DocksRoad_FF_00_0.text: Foundries can explode, the whole world can change, but if my orders stay the same, I stick to them.

DocksRoad_FF_00_1.speaker: Fist Pantella
DocksRoad_FF_00_1.text: These common folk need to learn to respect authority. Good thing I'm happy to teach them!

BaldursMouth_Worker_0.speaker: Trina
BaldursMouth_Worker_0.text: The Mouth is the real voice of the city. And it'll have plenty to say about this.

BaldursMouth_Worker_1.speaker: Trina
BaldursMouth_Worker_1.text: I can still remember a time when it was the editor's judgement we feared most.

BaldursMouth_Worker_2.speaker: Trina
BaldursMouth_Worker_2.text: Can't say I'll miss those metal marionettes - it's hardly a free press, if you're not free...

BaldursMouth_Worker_3.speaker: Trina
BaldursMouth_Worker_3.text: If the Steel watchers had eyes, at least you'd feel like you were being watched by something with a soul.

NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_01_0.speaker: Cinna Brewcellar
NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_01_0.text: This is a legitimate shipment of ale bound for the Blushing Mermaid here.

NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_01_5.speaker: Fist Rockbothem
NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_01_5.text: It's contraband, and I'm confiscating it.

NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_01_1.speaker: Cinna Brewcellar
NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_01_1.text: If you insist on this, I'm going to call for your supervisor.

NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_01_4.speaker: Fist Rockbothem
NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_01_4.text: If you don't comply, citizen, I'm going to call for a coffin cart.

NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_01_3.speaker: Cinna Brewcellar
NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_01_3.text: You can't just confiscate my cargo of ale. Where's your authorisation?

NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_01_2.speaker: Fist Rockbothem
NearMermaid_AD_FF_Trader_01_2.text: My authorisation? That ogre-sized steel bullyboy right there.

AtWall_FF_002_0.speaker: Fist Shargil
AtWall_FF_002_0.text: Tyr take it! This tin toy may decide to go off duty, but we still have a job to do.

AtWall_FF_002_1.speaker: Fist Shargil
AtWall_FF_002_1.text: We're rooting out disloyal elements among the problem citizens, all right? Now move along.

BasiliskGate_Civilian_000_0.speaker: Baz Hopbank
BasiliskGate_Civilian_000_0.text: Look at that thing, busted up and all. Yesterday it was the boss of the streets.

BasiliskGate_Civilian_000_1.speaker: Baz Hopbank
BasiliskGate_Civilian_000_1.text: One blow! One blow and she drops like she's dead! Maybe she is.

BaldursMouth_FF_000_0.speaker: Fist Glenvora
BaldursMouth_FF_000_0.text: Move along now - there's nothing to see here.

BaldursMouth_FF_000_1.speaker: Fist Glenvora
BaldursMouth_FF_000_1.text: These writers sure do have a lot to say. The amount of trees they must have cut down to print all these papers...

BaldursMouth_FF_000_4.speaker: Fist Glenvora
BaldursMouth_FF_000_4.text: And people complain about the Steel Watch taking up resources.

BaldursMouth_FF_000_2.speaker: Fist Glenvora
BaldursMouth_FF_000_2.text: Calling this news - Baldur's Mouth prints nothing but lies and drivel. You'd do well to dump your own copies.

BaldursMouth_FF_000_3.speaker: Fist Glenvora
BaldursMouth_FF_000_3.text: This Watcher is experiencing a temporary reset - everything is under control.

AtWall_FF_000_0.speaker: Fist Nephel
AtWall_FF_000_0.text: These citizens need to be evaluated. I'm sure this Watcher will sort itself out soon and we can all get on with it.

AtWall_FF_000_1.speaker: Fist Nephel
AtWall_FF_000_1.text: Be patient while these citizens are evaluated. This is all routine - make no sudden moves.

BaldursMouth_Civilian_000_0.speaker: Korrinna Koreena
BaldursMouth_Civilian_000_0.text: I'll sleep better tonight, knowing these hunks of scrap are off the streets.

BaldursMouth_Civilian_000_1.speaker: Korrinna Koreena
BaldursMouth_Civilian_000_1.text: It's an invasion of our bloody rights, having these things leering over everything we do.

BaldursMouth_Civilian_000_2.speaker: Korrinna Koreena
BaldursMouth_Civilian_000_2.text: Whoever did this, I'd like to shake their hand. Did you hear how patronising those Watchers were? Awful.

BaldursMouth_Civilian_000_3.speaker: Korrinna Koreena
BaldursMouth_Civilian_000_3.text: This is how it starts - Watchers for our 'protection'. Then it's censoring, curfews - and soon we have to ask permission to just exist.

BasiliskGate_Criminal_0.speaker: Gulster Boyes
BasiliskGate_Criminal_0.text: Aw, look, the damned thing went all to bits. Now isn't that a shame?

BasiliskGate_Criminal_1.speaker: Gulster Boyes
BasiliskGate_Criminal_1.text: What the hells happened? Last thing I remember, the Fists were after me.

BasiliskGate_Criminal_2.speaker: Narrator
BasiliskGate_Criminal_2.text: *This citizen is unconscious - and won't be waking up any time soon.*

Patrols_OnWall_FF_000_0.speaker: Fist Equidna
Patrols_OnWall_FF_000_0.text: Nice view from up here. It'll be nicer if you move along.

DocksRoad_Sailor_000_0.speaker: Kolobeg
DocksRoad_Sailor_000_0.text: Frankly, I'm reconsidering whether I want to make deliveries in a neighbourhood where buildings suddenly explode.

DocksRoad_Sailor_000_1.speaker: Kolobeg
DocksRoad_Sailor_000_1.text: I swear, this Fist is just trying to provoke me, but I'm not going to fall for it.

Bonecloak_Civ_003_0.speaker: Hyrla Sname
Bonecloak_Civ_003_0.text: Come to gawk at the busted Steel Watcher too? I feel kind of sorry for it...
Bonecloak_Civ_003_0.context: NodeContext: Pitying of the broken Steel Watcher robot

Bonecloak_Civ_003_1.speaker: Hyrla Sname
Bonecloak_Civ_003_1.text: I wonder if they have feelings somewhere in there... Well, had.

BasiliskGate_FF_000_0.speaker: Fist Nateen
BasiliskGate_FF_000_0.text: Once we find out who did that to the Watchers, we'll be knocking some heads together for sure.

BasiliskGate_FF_000_1.speaker: Fist Nateen
BasiliskGate_FF_000_1.text: These street trash need to watch their tone. I don't tolerate disrespect.
